text: The 2018 UAE Super Cup was the 18th and the 11th Professional UAE Super Cup, held at the 30 June Stadium, Cairo on 25 August 2018 between Al Ain, winners of the 2017–18 UAE Pro-League and 2017–18 UAE President's Cup and Al Wahda, winners of 2017–18 UAE League Cup. Al Wahda won the game 4–3 on penalties. ==Details== {| width=92% |- | | |} {| width="100%" |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" |colspan="4"| |- !width=25| !!width=25| |- |GK ||17 || Khalid Eisa |- |RB ||11 || Bandar Al- Ahbabi || |- |CB ||19|| Mohanad Salem (c) |- |CB ||23|| Mohamed Ahmed |- |LB ||33|| Tsukasa Shiotani || || |- |DM ||6|| Amer Abdulrahman |- |DM ||7 || Caio || |- |RW ||13 || Ahmed Barman || || |- |AM ||16|| Mohamed Abdulrahman |- |LW ||74|| Hussein El Shahat |- |ST ||9 || Marcus Berg || |- |colspan=3|Substitutes: |- |GK ||12|| Hamad Al-Mansoori |- |DF ||14|| Mohammed Fayez |- |DF ||15 || Khaled Abdulrahman || |- |MF ||18|| Ibrahim Diaky || || |- |MF ||43|| Rayan Yaslam || || |- |MF ||44|| Saeed Juma |- |MF ||88 || Yahia Nader Moustafa |- |MF ||99|| Jamal Maroof |- |FW ||20 || Saad Khamis |- |colspan=3|Manager: |- |colspan=4| Zoran Mamić |} |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" align=center |colspan="4"| |- !width=25| !!width=25| |- |GK ||50 || Rashed Ali |- |RB ||2|| Mohamed Barghash |- |CB ||8|| Hamdan Al-Kamali || |- |CB ||23|| Rim Chang-woo |- |LB ||52|| Hussain Abbas |- |DM ||5|| Mohammad Abdulla |- |CM ||6 || Sultan Al Ghaferi || || |- |SS ||9 || Mourad Batna || |- |RW ||10|| Ismail Matar (c) || || |- |LW ||11|| Sebastián Tagliabúe || |- |CF ||30|| Tareq Ahmed || || |- |colspan=3|Substitutes: |- |GK ||88|| Saeed Al-Mesmari |- |DF ||18 || Abdulla El Refaey |- |DF ||45 || Abdulla Al Hammadi |- |MF ||15|| Nasir Abdelhadi || || |- |MF ||32|| Mohamed Helal |- |MF ||36|| Ahmed Al Akberi |- |FW ||42|| Leonardo || || |- |MF ||20|| Yahya Ali |- |FW ||70|| Mohamed Rashid || || |- |colspan=3|Manager: |- |colspan=4| Laurențiu Reghecampf |} |} {| style="width:100%;
